items.sentence: What difference would it make if people did that?
What if I told you I really want to be a teacher?
When I give an order, I expect it to be followed.
Did anything interesting happen while I was gone?
Do you think that Tom will allow Mary to do that?
Tom felt guilty about the way he\'d treated Mary.
Tom said that he might not be at school tomorrow.
There\'s a good restaurant not too far from here.
Tom said he had something important to tell Mary.
You\'re going to have to do that sooner or later.
You\'re in the same situation that I was once in.
You\'re likely not to even notice any difference.
Tom couldn\'t have done that by himself, I think.
Tom didn\'t actually do what he said he would do.
This should be obvious, but apparently it\'s not.
I can\'t believe I didn\'t think of that earlier.
I\'m glad someone told me what needed to be done.
I\'m not going to leave you alone with Tom again.
Tom noticed a gunshot wound in Mary\'s right arm.
Don\'t ask Tom any questions about what happened.
Why don\'t you tell me how you think it happened?
Why don\'t you try putting a little salt on that?
You can\'t possibly really think Tom is a doctor.
You didn\'t need to tell me that. I already knew.
Tom wrote his name on the cover of his new diary.
Tom wrote me more than thirty messages yesterday.
How many hours a day do you spend in your office?
I advised him not to spend all his money on food.
I asked Tom if he really wanted to do that today.
I think I\'ve found what we\'ve been looking for.
I want my children to reach their full potential.
I want to be certain you are who you say you are.
I want to eat something that I can only eat here.
The kidnappers tied Tom\'s hands behind his back.
You should assume that Tom won\'t help us at all.
Why does it hurt when you get sweat in your eyes?
I\'ve already told everybody about what happened.
Tom spends most of his free time studying French.
Tom spends way too much time thinking about Mary.
Does Tom think he\'ll be in Australia all summer?
I wish that I hadn\'t gone to Australia with Tom.
I wish they could find out what\'s wrong with me.
Mary shaves her legs three or four times a month.
Have you been studying for more than three hours?
I did some shopping for Christmas on my way home.
A portrait of an old man was hanging on the wall.
Adding comments makes it easier to read the code.
After you have read it, give the book back to me.
You know this isn\'t the way I want things to be.
Tom doesn\'t seem to understand what\'s going on.
Tom doesn\'t seem to understand what\'s happened.
Don\'t you realize everything Tom said was a lie?
Tom and Mary don\'t like the same kind of movies.
Tom asked Mary to do that, so you don\'t have to.
Tom checked to make sure Mary was still sleeping.
Tom complained that it was too hot in the office.
Tom is the only one I know that can speak French.
I heard Tom came back to Australia for Christmas.
Put the medicine where children can\'t get at it.
We all got down on our knees and started to pray.
We confirmed the hotel reservations by telephone.
We had to rescue a skier who crashed into a tree.
We have a lot of good restaurants here in Boston.
We have many employees who can speak French well.
I haven\'t told you the most important thing yet.
You shouldn\'t judge people based on their names.
Tom asked Mary to go out to have dinner with him.
Tom asked Mary to lend him three hundred dollars.
Tom asked Mary what he should bring to the party.
Tom asked Mary when she was going to go shopping.
Tom wouldn\'t say something like that about Mary.
We\'ve never even seen anything like this before.
Keep an eye on my suitcase while I get my ticket.
I thought you and Tom were going to go to Boston.
I thought you were going to quit working for Tom.
I thought you were going to talk to Tom about it.
I didn\'t sleep a wink because of Tom\'s snoring.
Where were you the night the factory burned down?
Which do you speak more often, French or English?
Which of your parents do you think you look like?
Who do you expect to get Christmas presents from?
There\'s no chance that Tom will be here on time.
There\'s something I need to talk with you about.
You\'ll come back to see us sometime, won\'t you?
You\'re not going to like what I\'m going to say.
You\'re not just my wife. You\'re my best friend.
Let\'s forget the past and talk about the future.
Tom likes to eat a soft-boiled egg for breakfast.
I\'ve been living in this house since last month.
Tom doesn\'t care about what Mary says about him.
Tom doesn\'t even know how to write his own name.
I should\'ve paid more attention in French class.
I still can\'t speak French as well as I need to.
I still can\'t speak French as well as I want to.
I still don\'t understand exactly what Tom wants.
Tom hasn\'t been paying attention to the teacher.
I wonder how many buses can fit into this garage.
I wonder if I might have a moment alone with Tom.
I wonder if Mary realizes how poor Tom really is.
I wonder if Tom would like to play poker with us.
